item.description:
www.festivalofthelion.com
From the web site:

Even now we prepare, to make merry our faire!

Come one come all to the Festival of the Lion

A Medieval Fantasy Faire
in the Village of Graftonshire
(also known as Grafton, Massachusetts, USA)

A big Thank You to over 1000 guests who made the 2005 Festival a huge success!

Mark your calendars now for the 2006 Festival!

Our 10th season will be on
Sat August 26 th and Sun August 27th 2006


The faire will be open from 11:00 AM to 6:00 PM.

How To Get There
The entrance is on Brigham Hill Rd. in Grafton, across from Potter Hill Rd. From the Mass Pike take exit 11 to Rte 122 South. Take a right after the Grafton Police station onto Brigham Hill Road. Follow Brigham Road approximately one mile to the Lions Club Entrance on the right, across from Potter Hill Road.
Click here for a map.

Admission
$10.00 for adults
$5.00 for children ages 5 to 12
free for children 4 and under
Download and print this coupon (PDF) for a discount on admission.
(Print this page if you can't download and print PDF.)



This was brought to my attention by Tom, and it is an event that would be of interest to our members. If you'd like to go as a group, let's try to arrange something.

~John

For more information, see http://www.festivalof...
item.name: Festival of the Lion
